heading: nukes target us
subheading: despite clinton's claims to the contrary, chinese nuclear-tipped missiles remain trained on us cities. so says us intelligence anyway, although the report also mentions that none of the 13 css-4 missiles -- which have a range exceeding 8,000 miles -- is actually armed. in 1996, the president declared: "there is not a single, solitary nuclear missile pointed at an american child tonight. not one. not a single one."
author: wired staff
